pullRequest.title: Add support for let expression
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
This PR adds support for let expressions
Fixes #20685
Samples
int b = let int x = 4 in 2*x*globalVar;

int c = let int x = 4, int z = func(y + y*2 + globalVar) in z*(x+globalVar+y);

if((let int x = 4, int z = 5 in z*x) == 20) {
        a = let int x = 4, int z = 5+a in z+x+a+globalVar;
    }

function (int, int) returns int ar = (x, y) => let int m = 5+x, int n = 5+y in x+y+m+n+a+b+c+globalVar;
Please check tests/jballerina-unit-test/src/test/resources/test-src/expressions/let/let-expression-test.bal file on this PR for more samples.
Check List

 Read the Contributing Guide
 Updated Change Log
 Checked Tooling Support (#)
 Added necessary tests

 Unit Tests
 Spec Conformance Tests
 Integration Tests
 Ballerina By Example Tests


 Increased Test Coverage
 Added necessary documentation

 API documentation
 Module documentation in Module.md files
 Ballerina By Examples
